descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Tahoma][size=4]Begone Spiders of Skyrim
[/size][/font][/center][center]
This mod is for those whom dislike insects or have arachnophobia. The idea is to have a mod that does not replace the model of the Spiders (if it does, then just write down below in the comment section), but instead completely remove them from Skyrim. This is not quite lore friendly, but it's friendly for those whom don't want a heart attack after having a giant Spider jumping up n' down in their face.

There is another mod that can change these Spiders into Mudcrabs or Bears. I've used it, and it does not affect all the Spiders in Skyrim. I thought this is not good enough for someone who has arachnophobia.

This is a very simple mod, and it really did not require the slightest bit if skill to make. But I hope this mod will make
people happy.

If there is a quest that is related to getting an item from a Spider, or its objective is to make you kill a Spider. I recommend using the CMD in Skryim
to spawn that item, or to complete that quest.

~Ryan[/center]
author: RyansNuts
